SEARCH
Package executor.service.util.file

Class FileJsonParser

java.lang.Object
executor.service.util.file.FileJsonParser
All Implemented Interfaces:
FileParser
@Component public class FileJsonParser extends Object implements FileParser
Component for parsing JSON files, implementing the FileParser interface.

The FileJsonParser class is responsible for parsing JSON files and converting them into appropriate Java objects. It utilizes the Jackson ObjectMapper for handling JSON serialization and deserialization.

See Also:
  • FileParser
  • ObjectMapper
  • ResourceLoader

  • Constructor Details

    • FileJsonParser

      @Autowired public FileJsonParser(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper objectMapper, org.springframework.core.io.ResourceLoader resourceLoader)

      The constructor of this class is annotated with @Autowired, indicating that it is used for dependency injection by the Spring IoC container. It receives an ObjectMapper and a ResourceLoader as dependencies. These dependencies are crucial for the proper functioning of the JSON parsing and resource loading capabilities of this component.

      Constructor Parameters:

      • objectMapper: The Jackson ObjectMapper for JSON serialization and deserialization.
      • resourceLoader: The Spring ResourceLoader for loading resources, including JSON files.
      Parameters:
      objectMapper - The Jackson ObjectMapper for JSON serialization and deserialization.
      resourceLoader - The Spring ResourceLoader for loading resources, including JSON files.

  • Method Details

    • getAllFromFile

      public <T> List<T> getAllFromFile(String filePath, Class<T> type) throws IOException
      Reads the contents of a specified JSON file and returns a list of objects of the specified type.

      This method utilizes the ObjectMapper to read and deserialize the JSON content from the specified file path. The resulting list of objects is of the type provided as a parameter to the method.

      The file path is assumed to be relative to the classpath, and the ResourceLoader is used to obtain a Resource representing the JSON file.

      Specified by:
      getAllFromFile in interface FileParser
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of objects to be deserialized from the JSON file.
      Parameters:
      filePath - The relative path to the JSON file within the classpath.
      type - The Class object representing the type of objects to be deserialized.
      Returns:
      A List of objects of the specified type, parsed from the JSON file.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs during file reading or JSON deserialization.
      See Also:
      • ObjectMapper
      • ResourceLoader
      • Resource

    • getFromFile

      public <T> T getFromFile(String filePath, Class<T> type) throws IOException
      Reads the contents of a specified JSON file and returns an object of the specified type.

      This method utilizes the ObjectMapper to read and deserialize the JSON content from the specified file path. The resulting object is of the type provided as a parameter to the method.

      The file path is assumed to be relative to the classpath, and the ResourceLoader is used to obtain a Resource representing the JSON file.

      Specified by:
      getFromFile in interface FileParser
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of object to be deserialized from the JSON file.
      Parameters:
      filePath - The relative path to the JSON file within the classpath.
      type - The Class object representing the type of object to be deserialized.
      Returns:
      An object of the specified type, parsed from the JSON file.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs during file reading or JSON deserialization.
      See Also:
      • ObjectMapper
      • ResourceLoader
      • Resource
